text: it is kind of hard to believe that amazon would produce an application this bad it is actually one of the worst i have ever tried especially when compared with the amazon webster i could not find a way to navigate there is a menu to go back to the home page so you can have the pleasure of redoing your search from scratch seriously no back button if there is a way to navigate it is hidden really well the sorting feature are mostly missing i could not find a way to filter by size department manufacturer and etc a we all know there are a lot of product on amazon so lack of sorting make for a painful shopping experience take forever to find stuff i definitely will not be shopping with this application i immediately deleted this application from my phone this application is a total waste of storage space
original_text: It is kind of hard to believe that Amazon would produce an app this bad.  It is actually one of the worst I've ever tried-- especially when compared  with the Amazon website.  I couldn't find a way to navigate.   There is a menu to go back to the home page, so you can have the pleasure of redoing your search from scratch.  Seriously? No back button?  If there is a way to navigate it is hidden really well.  The sorting features are mostly missing.  I couldn't find a way to filter by size, department, manufacturer, and etc.  As we all know there are a LOT of products on Amazon, so lack of sorting makes for a painful shopping experience-- takes forever to find stuff.  I definitely won't be shopping with this app.  I immediately deleted it from my phone-- it's a total waste of storage space.

The app now only displays the lowest price of items rather than the fact the listing is for multiple items at varying prices. EX you see a shirt listed as 7.99$, click on it then see the price ranges from 7.99$-34.99$, pick a size to find out said shirt is now 24.99$. Also you no longer have the options to set a price range to find products in yourself. To top it off if you filter from low to high, results drop from 80000+ to 50.
